quote: The mind uses the power of thought to win the world.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A soul gives power to the mind; and the mind empowers the soul
author: Jeremy Aldana

quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
author: Seneca,  The Stoic Philosophy of Seneca: Essays and Letters

quote: The mind is a powerful thing. It can take you through walls.
author: Denis Avey,  The Man Who Broke Into Auschwitz: A True Story of World War II

quote: Mind is a flexible mirror, adjust it, to see a better world.
author: Amit Ray,  Mindfulness : Living in the Moment - Living in the Breath

quote: Mind makes a man of God.
author: Emmanuel Diogu

quote: the mind is a neural computer
author: Steven Pinker,  How the Mind Works

quote: The mind is a metaphor of the world of objects.
author: Pierre Bourdieu

quote: The power of thought is the light of knowledge, the power of will is the energy of character, the power of heart is love. Reason, love and power of will are perfections of man.
author: Ludwig Feuerbach,  The Essence of Christianity

quote: Mental strength induces mind and body.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: The power of human thought grows exponentially with the number of minds that share that thought.
author: Dan Brown,  The Lost Symbol

quote: A Controlled Mind Can Create All That It Words...!
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: Power is not found in muscles; power is found in the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The mind is so powerful that is can suddenly grow wings of imagination and fly in the open sky.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A mind possessed by unmade books.
author: Michael Faudet

quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
author: Aristotle,  The Philosophy of Aristotle

quote: The mind of man is capable of anything.
author: Joseph Conrad,  Heart of Darkness

quote: The weaker mind reacts.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: A mind is like a puzzle; you must unlock it to read its hidden secrets.
author: Melissa de la Cruz,  Masquerade

quote: The disempowered mind believes dreams come true; the empowered mind knows you bring your dreams to life.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The mind is a complex and many-layered thing, Potter... or at least, most minds are...
author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: On the way toward success, obstacles are the barrier to build the power of the mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The mind is the strongest tool we have to help us secure the riches within the universe.
author: Stephen Richards,  Cosmic Ordering Guide

quote: Power-lust is a weed that grows only in the vacant lots of an abandoned mind.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged

quote: Thoughts are one of the most creative powers we have as human beings. If you hold the mantra in your mind that you are continually becoming more healthful and radiant, that is what you will become.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: The only way somebody can have control over our mind is if we don’t have control over it.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Unfathomable mind: now beacon, now sea.
author: Samuel Beckett,  Molloy, Malone Dies, The Unnamable

quote: Powerful words harmonize heart and mind as if a symphony.
author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity

quote: The mind is just like a muscle - the more you exercise it, the stronger it gets and the more it can expand.
author: Idowu Koyenikan,  Wealth for All: Living a Life of Success at the Edge of Your Ability

quote: The mind is the mine of man, wherein he digs out good or evil.
author: Ogwo David Emenike,  The Fortune in Failing: Decoding the Message of Failure

quote: IT’s All In The Game Of Mind.
author: Sujit Lalwani,  Life Simplified!

quote: The momentum of the mind can be vexingly, involuntarily capricious.
author: Gregory Maguire,  A Lion Among Men

quote: The mind creates those things that exist.
author: Terry Tempest Williams,  Pieces of White Shell

quote: time made me stronger, you're no longer on my mind
author: Boyz II Men

quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
author: Bob Marley

quote: The unfed mind devours itself.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: Whoever possessed knowledge not only had power over the changeable passions of people, but also power over their thinking, over their minds, hearts and souls.
author: Peter Prange,  The Philosopher's Kiss: A Novel

quote: It is not enough to have a good mind. The main thing is to use it well.
author: René Descartes,  Discourse on Method

quote: You could achieve nothing with wondered mind! you need to stop it!
author: Kunal Jajal

quote: there're times when i suspect that the mind has a mind of its own. it shows us pictures. pictures of the past and the might-one-day-be. this mind's mind exerts its own will, too, and has its own voice
author: David Mitchell,  The Thousand Autumns of Jacob de Zoet

quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich: A Black Choice

quote: Two minds with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one.
author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels

quote: The purification of the mind is very necessary. (72)
author: Swami Satchidananda,  The Yoga Sutras

quote: Directing the mind to stay in the present can be a formidable task.
author: Allan Lokos,  Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: My mind's my kingdom.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: Thoughts become things. If you see it in your mind, you will hold it in your hand.
author: Bob Proctor,  You Were Born Rich

quote: The creative mind seeks chance and accident while everyone else seeks control and order. Rod Judkins ‘Change Your Mind
author: Rod Judkins,  Change Your Mind: 57 Ways to Unlock Your Creative Self

quote: Invariably, we all are 'MIND LORDS'.
author: Ogwo David Emenike
